document.heading: Firefighter Retirement While Under Disciplinary Investigation Amendment Act of 2014

history.narrative: Law 20-236, the “Firefighter Retirement While Under Disciplinary Investigation Amendment Act of 2014,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 20-890. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on Nov. 18, 2014, and Dec. 2, 2014, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on Jan. 6, 2015, it was assigned Act No. 20-561 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 20-236 became effective on Mar. 11, 2015.
